definition: first day of the month/toilet/(slang) top (in a homosexual relationship)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people
(coll.) to go pee/to go to the bathroom
Tianwen-1, Chinese mission to put a robotic rover on Mars launched in 2020
Air Force One, US presidential jet

sentences.english: Now, Pacquiao is the hottest thing going in the world.
sentences.chinese: 眼下，帕奎奧是炙手可熱的天字第一號。

sentences.english: I can get you bigger ones.
sentences.chinese: 我可以給您拿大一號的。

sentences.english: Today is April 1. it April fool's day.
sentences.chinese: 今天是四月一號是愚人節。

sentences.english: Cathy: Excuse me, sir. You have a call on line one.
sentences.chinese: 對不起先生，一號線有您的電話。

sentences.english: Maybe it was the only time that I acted as lead actor in my life.
sentences.chinese: 那也許是我一生唯一的一次男一號的經歷了。

sentences.english: A Xilang bound Guangzhou Metro Line 1 train departs from Gongyuanqian Station.
sentences.chinese: 往西朗的廣州地鐵一號線列車開出公元前站。

sentences.english: Today is November first! nineteen sixty-three.
sentences.chinese: 這日是一九六三年十一月一號。

sentences.english: Qingdao City Subway Ride on the 4th line and the base station is located on the west side district.
sentences.chinese: 青島市地鐵一號線和四號換乘站位於小區基地西側。

sentences.english: I leave for Germany⑾ on the 11th of next month.
sentences.chinese: 我下個月十一號去德國。

sentences.english: Ship 1 is available for use as a backup during the flight test program.
sentences.chinese: 一號機在在飛行試驗計劃中作爲試飛的後備。

sentences.english: If a heavy base layer is to be worn under it, going up a size might be warranted.
sentences.chinese: 如果需要穿厚的打底衫，買大一號會比較合適。

sentences.english: With this problem solved, neomycin 1 is now in regular production.
sentences.chinese: 隨着這個問題的解決，新黴素一號現在已經正式產生。

sentences.english: Jiantan, the passenger to Shilin night market, please exit by exit one.
sentences.chinese: 劍潭，往士林夜市的旅客，請於一號出口出站。

sentences.english: So that is best element of cultivated combination for CB-1.
sentences.chinese: 是翠碧一號最佳的栽培因子組合。

sentences.english: Ship 1, a duplicate, was used for the wind tunnel tests.
sentences.chinese: 一號機作爲備份也用於風洞試驗。

sentences.english: No matter how other people that I have in mind the No. 1 hero, is Qiao Feng.
sentences.chinese: 不管別人怎麼說，我心目中的第一號英雄，就是喬峯。

definition: the fifth/fifth day of a month
building (a relatively large, multi-storey one)/CL:幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
(used in the names of grand buildings such as 百老匯大廈|百老汇大厦 Broadway Mansions (in Shanghai) or 帝國大廈|帝国大厦 Empire State Building etc)
on the eve of/to be about to/to be on the verge of
Wan Chai district of Hong Kong
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]
